DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to examine whether co-administration of rifampin with neratinib has an effect on the pharmacokinetics (how the body absorbs, distributes, metabolizes and/or excretes) of neratinib.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating The Potential Effect Of Rifampin On The Pharmacokinetics Of Neratinib
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Healthy men or women (of non childbearing potential) Ages 18 to 50 years old.
